bio.short: Ron is founder and CEO of Sqquid, a channel management and order fulfillment company for small and mid-size retailers.
bio.long: Ron has over 15 years of experience in ecommerce, with 7 years as CTO. He started Sqquid two years ago, which specializes in channel management & order fulfillment for retailers that have 1-100 store locations. Ron also keeps the fire burning by mentoring & coaching other CTOs.
